mutants.code:
def calculate_jem_time(N, B, M):
    total_time = 1
    while N > 0:
        total_time += B
        half = (N + 1) // 2 if N % 2 else N // 2
        total_time += M * half
        M *= 2
        N -= half
    return total_time - B

def calculate_jem_time(N, B, M):
    total_time = -1
    while N > 0:
        total_time += B
        half = (N + 1) // 2 if N % 2 else N // 2
        total_time += M * half
        M *= 2
        N -= half
    return total_time - B
